text: Today on the West Coast, it's a bit rough with 7 ft @12s W and fresh 34 mph ESE winds making it blown out. Tomorrow, conditions remain poor with 5 ft @12s W and 26 mph ENE winds, still not ideal. By the day after, things improve slightly with 3 ft @10s W and lighter 15 mph ESE winds, making it workable at spots like Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay. Best: day after.
